data.fullContent: Toussaint married Suzanne Simone Baptiste in 1782. Suzanne was probably his cousin. People think that he had 16 children, and that 11 of them had already died before he did himself. His oldest son was adopted. The two sons born out of his marriage with Suzanne were Isaac and Saint-Jean.
data.answer: 1782年，杜桑与苏珊娜·西蒙娜·巴蒂斯特结婚。苏珊娜可能是他的表妹。人们认为他有16个孩子，其中11个在他自杀前就已经去世了。他的大儿子被收养了。他和苏珊娜婚后所生的两个儿子是艾萨克和圣约翰。
